reviewText: "Not Quite Human 1", Not Quite Human 2", and "Still Not Quite Human" on VHS are wonderful movies.  I so very much wish they were offered on DVD, because they'll get buried in my memory and likely lost someday.  Amazon, I know you have permissions to "copy" certain DVD's for sale.  Can you please try to get permission for these?  I know they'd sell.  Thank you very much!
They need to bring this movie to DVD . I love this movie
Put it on digital already. Too good of a movie to be left in an obsolete format

Not quite human 2 is even better than the 1st. Now Chip starts college shares a room with a rock n roll addict and befriends him to fit in which proves difficult, Then attends a party which ends up turning to disaster, Meets a girl who also turns out to be an android and ends up chasing after her to save her life. Overall it's comical and a quality Disney movie.  Enjoy!
This movie is a sequel to "Not Quite Human" which is a story about an android that has human tendencies. It is a great family movie with excitement built in and romance too.
I bought this movie for my daughter because she she has the first movie "Not Quite Human". She enjoy watching the movie.
